name: Working As Intended
description:
"This is a story of a bugged game and a patch to be delivered."

"Became the Legendary Debugger and save the Game!"

This is our first Game Jam, we've learned quite a lot of new stuff with Unreal and we've experimented with new mechanics we had in mind.

Considering the time restrictions we are proud of the result.

Made with Unreal Engine 4.20.3 by: Roberto Pavan & Francesco Catalano
